text:
Fernanda Miranda Paes Leme de Abreu (born 4 June 1983) is a Brazilian actress. She was born in São Paulo. She is known for her television roles in "Sandy & Junior", "Um Só Coração" and "Insensato Coração". She has also appeared in movies such as "O Homem Que Desafiou o Diabo" (2007) and "Cilada.com" (2011).
In March 2020, during the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic, Paes Leme tested positive for COVID-19.

annotations.surface_form: O Homem Que Desafiou o Diabo
